ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Chains Reliability
ygData.msgSnippet: Binding does not break messed mobs as it is a simple debuff.  I have used it countless times with messed mobs standing all around me.  Chords will, however,
ygData.messageBody:
Binding does not break messed mobs as it is a simple debuff. I have used it
countless times with messed mobs standing all around me. Chords will,
however, because it has a DoT component.

[48 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

> From: jhenders@...
>
> On Mon, Mar 20/00, "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> wrote:
> > From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
> >
> > I'd have been happy if it just snared, I already have Largo's to reduce
> > attack speed if I need to.
>
> AOE is no substitute for a targetted song. Not only are there still a
> few places even with overcrowding where AoE can cause problems, they are
> a total writeoff when an enchanter is involved.
